subject: Follow up on project Alpha
body: We need to finalize the budget with Alex by Friday.

subject: Design review scheduled
body: The design team scheduled a review of the new dashboard UI for Wednesday afternoon.

subject: Feedback on Beta demo
body: Great job on the Beta demo! Just a few tweaks left before client presentation.

subject: Team Lunch Reminder
body: Friendly reminder: Team lunch tomorrow at noon. Let us know if you have dietary restrictions.

subject: Urgent: Data sync issue
body: We're seeing a mismatch in sync between backend and reports. Can you look into it today?
